content.question: A cart moves along a horizontal, one-dimensional track according to the position-time graph shown, where positive position values represent locations to the right of the origin. Which of the following statements correctly describe the cartâ€™s instantaneous velocity at time <math alttext="5 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>?

choices.label: The cart is moving left with speed <math alttext="1.0 centimeter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>cm/s</mtext></math>.
The cart is moving right with speed <math alttext="1.0 centimeter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>cm/s</mtext></math>.
The cart is moving left with speed <math alttext="0.5 centimeter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>cm/s</mtext></math>.
The cart is moving right with speed <math alttext="0.5 centimeter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>cm/s</mtext></math>.

content.answer: The cart is moving left with speed <math alttext="0.5 centimeter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>cm/s</mtext></math>.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
